Module onethreeseven.stosem
Package onethreeseven.stosem.model.markov

Class MarkovState

  • java.lang.Object
    • onethreeseven.stosem.model.markov.MarkovState

  • public abstract class MarkovState
extends java.lang.Object
    A state in a markov model, these model the internal finite states that the model can potentially be in at any given observation. For our purposes we model states as unique, and thus we give each state its own id. Also, we enforce that each state can calculate the probability of itself occurring (i.e its emission probability) and the probability of moving itself to some other states (i.e its transition probabilities). However, these probabilities are problem specific, and are therefore left abstract.

        public abstract double getLogEmissionPr​()
        Calculates the log-probability that this state occurred given some observation.
        Returns:

      • getLogTransitionPr

        public abstract double getLogTransitionPr​(MarkovState toState)
        Calculate the log-probability that this state will transition to some other state.
        Parameters:
        toState - The state being transitioned to.
        Returns:
        The transition probability (higher number means it is more likely).
